Summary Note:
Willems De Jong Wagemakers and the RM met at a networking event in Amsterdam. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Willems De Jong Wagemakers is a 45 year old CEO from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Willems De Jong Wagemakers and Joyce tied the knot in 2009. Their children are named Peeters, Van Dijk and Krol.
Education Background:
Willems graduated from Montessori Lyceum Rotterdam in 1997.
Willems attended Nyenrode Business Universiteit and graduated in 2003.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 21 years, Willems De Jong Wagemakers has established himself as a key player in the industry.
At Philips Healthcare, Willems De Jong Wagemakers held the position of Research Scientist from 2004 to 2005, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Biotech Startup Founder at Galapagos N.V. in 2005, further expanding his skill set.
His tenure as a CEO at Philips Healthcare from 2010 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 480000 EUR.
He has house located in Doetinchem, worth 1284000 EUR.

He purchased flat in Roosendaal, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1320000 EUR.

Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Real Estate Developer, he received an inheritance of 150000 EUR in 2013, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
